channel.title: Why have BitBay price charts and info disappeared from CoinmMarketCap in the past week?
channel.description: What's happening? Are BitBay still operational? Is trading still possible?

item.title: Why have BitBay price charts and info disappeared from CoinmMarketCap in the past week?
item.dc:creator: @tradersnow
item.description:
@tradersnow wrote:

LA Token has not provided us with a timeline, as the issue is fairly complex to fix. That said, they are working around the clock to fix it and will reopen trading as soon as possible.

Read full topic
item.source: Why have BitBay price charts and info disappeared from CoinmMarketCap in the past week?

item.title: Why have BitBay price charts and info disappeared from CoinmMarketCap in the past week?

item.description:
@proteanman wrote:

Does anyone know of a timeline for when LA Token will fix this issue?
I can’t find any information on their end.

item.source: Why have BitBay price charts and info disappeared from CoinmMarketCap in the past week?

item.title: Why have BitBay price charts and info disappeared from CoinmMarketCap in the past week?
item.dc:creator: @tradersnow
item.description:
@tradersnow wrote:

Trading is temporarily paused while LA Token resolves a bug on their end. Also the price info is still listed here on Coin Gecko:

CoinGecko

BitBay (BAY) price, marketcap, chart, and info | CoinGecko

Get BitBay (BAY) price, volume, coin market cap, supply, exchanges, news and other key information to help you with your cryptocurrency trading.

Read full topic
item.source: Why have BitBay price charts and info disappeared from CoinmMarketCap in the past week?

item.title: Why have BitBay price charts and info disappeared from CoinmMarketCap in the past week?
item.dc:creator: @cryptomaniac111
item.description:
@cryptomaniac111 wrote:

BitBay was only listed on LaToken exchange, they found some glitch and are trying to fix it and until then BitBay is not listed anywhere so trading is not possible atm, coinmarketcap gets its data from exchanges that is why no charts, but that should not spike fear because i think after this updates, other exchanges will start listing the token again.

Read full topic
item.source: Why have BitBay price charts and info disappeared from CoinmMarketCap in the past week?
